text: shri lankawa wenuwen dhanushka

trotski abhawaye haththa atawana anusmaranaya pawathwena me dinayedi, trotski siya jiwithaya kapa kala loka samajawadaye muladharma ha kriyamargaya perata genayana jathyanthara kamituwa, me asamanya wiplawawadiyage mathakaya wenuwen pranamaya pudakarayi.

ee athin dakunu aasiyawe lankawe, indiyawe, bangalideshaye wage ratawala inna dushitha polis niladharin ekka me wage nithiyak thawath pothakata sima wechch ara kiyapu polis niladharinta awashya paridi hasuruwamin jarawa goda gahaganna thibena thawath mawathakda kiyala hithanna wenawa.

me gana satahan karana kathlin jayawardhana mese pawasayi: “‘ransalu’ chithrapataya pilibanda, ehi gambauru abhyanthara dhwaniya pilibanda wa widhimath wicharayak eda meda thura siduwi aththe da yana prashnaya da magahara ya nohaki yayi apata sitheyi.

una hadigena enawa wage monawath liyanna amaruyi

atham jathyanthara nirikshakayinge nirikshanaya wanne ‘anthawadi prachandathwaya idurama thrasthawadayata hethuwana bawath anthawadaya ese nowana bawathya.
chanda kale me dewal kiwwama yahapalanala kiwwe billo mawanawa kiyala.

rassawak‘‘keti natya ee athara wenawa.
swabhawika wananthara madin gaman kota oba dan kumarawaththa bangalawa wetha samipa wi siti.
ewakata ‘sarasawiya’ pathraye kathuwaraya mama wimi.
susil prema jayantha eksath janatha nidahas sandhanaya mahindata pawa dima gana puduma wiya yuthu natha.
ema sarasawiye sisun, aacharayawaran biya ganwa tharjanathmaka postar alawa dammeth ee nisaya.

thamange ge du daruwan gen pawa hondak asannata labena awastha ada samajaye aduyi neda ..owungen pawa awalada nosathuta athiwana dewal apita asannata wana bawa apa hondinma dannawa namuth ehema kiya apa daruwan nohada sitinne na neda..

batahira widyawe bankoloth darshanayata anuwa apa thoragatha yuththe wada sarthaka pattapal boruwa ya.
ehema aya paththakata una nam.
eeta prathyaya kawareda?
tharaka widyagnya shi්ramath engmanng helita gaurawayak lesa nam karanu labuwa.
aththama kiyanawa nam ape golu nayitwarayage hithe mokak thiyenawada kiyanta api hariyatama danne na.
monada sellam karanna danne...?"nodakin hothambauwa ahapu lassana witharak.
meya ithama lajja sahagathayi.
janadhipathi garu maithi්rapala sirisena mathithumage sishels sancharaya sanituhan karamin erata jathika udbhida udyanaye bijayak ropanaya kirima eeye (09) perawaruwe sidu wiya.
hakinam mewa kuranaye nathi bawa oppu karanna.
panathakin nonawathi jathika thorathuru paddhathiyak nirmanaya kirima, ee sambandhayen gatha haki eelaga piyawara wiya haki ya.
ekama eka ee satha...
"ehema kiyanna epayi.
kalaniyen marapiris kollupitiyata goda basseth natha.

wanija mandala, welanda sangam ha wruththiya sangam samaga apa amathyanshaye pawathwa gena yana sanwadaya anekuth yojitha giwisumwalata adalawa da nokadawa idiriyata pawathwagena yamata api balaporoththu wemu.“
mama thaniyama yanna hadanawita wimal ma ekka aawa.
pasuwa ki paksha siyalu prashnawalata wagakiwa yuththe aanduwa yayi no kiyayi.
eyata godawu pasu ehi athi chiththakarshaniya darshanaya obawa welaganu atha.

wishesha adhikarana pihituwa dushana, wancha saha minimarum athulu aparadha sambandhayen wagakiwayuththan nithiya hamuwata pamunuwa danduwam dimata kadinam piyawara noganne nam, wyawastha sanshodhanaya athulu prajathanthrawadaya shakthimath kirime piyawara ganime hakiyawak rajayata labenne nathi bawatada kafe widhayaka adhyaksha kirthi thennakon mahatha anathuru angawiya.
emangin janadhipathi diwayit
"handa handa paminiyahoth maranaya,
praharayata lak wu maha komasariswaraya me wana wita waidya prathikara laba ganimin sitina bawath ohuge thathwaya asadhya nowana bawath niyojya amathya harsha da silwa sandahan kaleya.

kese namuth dawima digatama sidu wana athara guwanyana indhana skandhaya kramayen aduwana athara barata udukuru anupathaya 1 ikmawana athara wadath bara adu wu rathaya kakshikaya desata thwaranaya wima aarambha karayi.
me nisa sinhala aluth awurudde sinhalakama rakaganime awashyathawak ada mathuwela thibenawa neda?

aayojana bhanda aanayanaya wenuwen wiyadama wadi wuwa da paribhogika bhanda saha anthar bhanda aanayanaya ka්ramayen 2012 ape්ral sita adu wuye rajya pa්rathipaththi nisa bawa maha bankuwe widesha karya sadhana warthawa sandahan karayi.
“agramathyathuma heta parlimenthuwata wishesha prakashayak karanawa.

wasara dahas gananaka gamanakin pasuwa yam dineka buddhimath jiwinta me yana muna gasunoth owunta woyejar yana nipada wu ha abhyawakashayata yawu manawa wargaya pilibanda igiyak laba dima ehi aramunayi.

mema wishwa widyalaye da salake 52 thula eksath janapada puwathwishishtathama goliya wishwa widyala shrenigatha kirim, 60 tayims usas adhyapanaya loka wishwa widyala shrenigatha kirim saha 77 loka wishwa widyala adhyayana shrenigatha di.

oya hotalema ajith kukul mas hoddakuth denawa demalen kiyanne koli kiyala.kukulata pollakin gahala kudukarala rathulunu yahamin dala hadana hoddak.rasa gana kiyanna deyak nane.mokada mama kalayak male widiye parana adhyapana amathyansha godanagille wadakala.api ude hawasa othanin yanne.kompanynyawidiye istesamen bahala wadata yanne enne.ee hariye thiyena hora polawal okkoma danagaththe ee kalediyi.
api karana wada gana kawuruwath katha karanne naha.
kohenwath dakina deyakwath ahena deyak wath oona na mama hithanne..
ochcharama deshapremi nam podurajya mandalayen ayinwenna thibunane..

memagin yuda hamudawata awashya aahara sapayagannata haki wi thibenawa wagema me awata gramiya janathawata rakiya awastha udakarala dila owunge jiwana thaththwaya usas karannath, sanwardhanaya me gamwalata gena ennath hakiyawa labi thibenawa.
rila mallila eewata udin panala awith janel padiya uda wadiwela widuruwata aha thiyala mama mokada karanne kiyala balagena innawa.
mema awastha waladi, waidyawaraya wisin parikshana sandaha roga winishchaya parikshana sidu kala hakiya pap, altra sawund ho kolposkopi anek eewa athara.

wethin sampraweshanaya kerini	prawarga: aprel 2007 sita mulashra rahitha lipiprabhasansleshanayashaka sailajiwa widyawasaila jiwa widyawasaila jiwa widyawa kota lipisangawunu prawarga: sakillehi anithika datham paramithika sahitha lipimulashra rahitha siyalu lipi	sanchalana menuwa
me kruthiye ingrisi pariwarthana gananawak ma 19 wani siyawase agabhagaye di patan 1970 dashakaya dakwa ma yuropiya ugathun wisin idiripath karanu laba thibe.

ithin pinwathuni mama aaradhana karanawa mage me kathawa kiyawala mata yahapath prathichara dakwanna kiyala.onna dan meka kadakappal koranna ara kadadasi kole liyana eki kiyawi mama parana post dala jame beragannawa kiyala .na pinwathuni mama ehema na.

budu himiyange lankagamana pilibandawa sandahan ema sahithya mulashrayagatha thorathuruwalata pamanak simawi sampradayika thirayak osse uktha mathrukawa sakachcha karanawata wada wicharashili mawathak osse eya wimarshanaya kirima yogyaya.
mage wadasatahana dewarak ma patigatha kirimata yoda gena thibu dina wenas wu bawin " wade adena bawa " mata therum giya nisa ee guwanwiduli wadasahana sandaha mage thibu unanduwa gilihi giye ya.
ratak jathiyak lesa brithanyaye landan nuwarata ellawu praharaya api hela dakinnemu.

aga්ramathya ranil wika්ramasinha mahatha saha mahanagara ha basnahira sanwardhana amathya patali champika ranawaka mahatha ada(02) dina jathyanthara mulya nagaraye nirikshana charikawaka niratha wu athara ehidi godanagemin pawathina mulya nagaraye warthamana thathwaya pilibandawa aga්ramathyawarayage nirikshanayata lakwiya.
ee wenuwata aanduwa yedigena sitinne wirakiyawa upayogi karagena aayojakayinta labha shrama thatakayak sada dime uthsahayaka ya.

eelangata, me siyallatamath wada, mathiwarana sandaha barapana darimata hakiyawakda me boho denata natha.

mehidi thawath gataluwak da ma thula mathuwe.

ara ajith kumarasiri nam kiyayi hondata me wage eewa.
ma sathuwa dan bim angalakudu natha.

wisi ek wana siyawasata ooni deshapalanaya thawama bihiwela naha kiyalath therenawa.
mehi pethsamkaraka parshawaya nithiya saha sadaranathwaya sadaha wana padanamayi.
dadi kota ganuyem sanskarayan ma dadi kota gathimi.
me nithi wirodhi dadayakkarayanwa dadayam kirima, ee ratawala wanajiwi niladharinge saha sathwa ayithin pilibanda ka්riyadharayange pa්radhana abhiyogayak wi thibe.
issara eyata awurudu 12 wage kale thimbairi gedi wage sayis than thibbe, habayi ewwa issellama pawichchi kale demalek kiyala.
balagara dekama aththe shri lankaweya.

“samaja madhya jala thula asathya prakasha,wairi prakasha saha apekshakayan prawardhanaya karana danwim saha noyekuth satahan chayarupa palawana bawa digin digatama paminili labemin pawathi.ada dina mathiwarana komishan sabhawe sabhapathiwaraya kalayi kiyana asathya prakasha mita pera pala wuwak men nawatha pracharaya wimata patan gena thibu athara eya fesbuk aayathanaya wetha paminili kara iwath kirimata piyawara gena thibe.
oba giya aakarayatama 122 bas wala mipe sita gaman kale .
ee ekkama thada danduwam dima nam hariyana ekak na mage hithe.

rathgama bussa rathna udagama padinchiwa siti gonapinuwalage asela manjula kumara saha kosma rasika chinthaka namathi dedena ikuth janawari 23 wani dina paharagena gos ghathanaya kara pulussa damima sambandhayen mema sakakaruwan athadanguwata gena rakshitha bandhanagaragatha kara atha.

shi්ra lankawa saha pakisthanaya athara kolambaa es. es. si. pitiyedi pawathwena dewani test ki්rakat tharagaye siwuwani dinaya wu ada (17 wanida) thunwani kadulla wenuwen lakunu 107 k ekkala mahela jayawardhana saha kumar sangakkara dedena test ki්rakat ithihasaye wadima shathaka sambandhatha godananwu pithikaruwan athara dewani sthanaya athkaragathha.

hathwani samuluwa 1918 dida atawani samuluwa 1919 dida, nawawani samuluwa 1920 dida, dahawani samuluwa 1921 dida, ekolos wani samuluwa 1922 dida, pawathwana ladi. 1923 di pawathwu doloswani samuluwata siya asanipaya hethukotagena lenin sahabhagi nowiya.

supiri jayaga්rahakayan bihi karamin aarambha kala mema suba nawa wasara heta dinaye sita wasara pura wasanawa gena ena bawin sanwardhana lotharayi tikatpath samagin wishwasayen randi sitina lesa sanwardhana lotharayi mandalaya mema awasthawedi illa sitiyeya.

kathawa gana kiyanawa nam fedriksan ge podi kale wiraya thamayi chals monts kiyanne eyage wira chithrapati gaweshana aniwaryenma naraona kenek thamayi fedriksan.dawasak chalsi monts ta kamathi thawath kene fedriksanta hamuwenawa.ee thamayi eli.elith tikak dagalilak thiyana ganu lamayek elige gana pothak thiyanawa.meke eli karanna hithagena inna wikramanwitha kriyawak ganayi thiyenne.ee thamayi dakunu amarikawe thiyana paradisaye diya alla balanna yanna.aya me potha penwanne fedriksanta witharayi.denna hoda yaluwo bawata pathwenawa.kalayak yaddi fedriksan ha eli aadaraya karala wiwahawenawa.
